title: DreamDucatiTeam
author: DreamDucatiTeam
content: Hello Friends, looking for really good programs to earn totally FREE bitcoin n Eth and Altcoins any suggestions or advice really appreciated and thanks

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: If by free, you mean without having to do any work, the answer for any established coin is no. However, there are "airdrops" for new altcoins, but watch out for scams and pump-and-dump schemes.

comments.author: DreamDucatiTeam
comments.body: Quote from: odolvlobo on September 04, 2023, 04:02:33 AMIf by free, you mean without having to do any work, the answer for any established coin is no. However, there are "airdrops" for new altcoins, but watch out for scams and pump-and-dump schemes.I dont mean not working. i am doing clicking on freebit and i have time to click n watch videos. like freebitcoin i need more really good paying one. about airdrop how can i get it can you give me more details please thanks

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: DreamDucatiTeam on September 04, 2023, 12:03:04 PMQuote from: odolvlobo on September 04, 2023, 04:02:33 AMIf by free, you mean without having to do any work, the answer for any established coin is no. However, there are "airdrops" for new altcoins, but watch out for scams and pump-and-dump schemes.I dont mean not working. i am doing clicking on freebit and i have time to click n watch videos. like freebitcoin i need more really good paying one. about airdrop how can i get it can you give me more details please thanksThe most effective way to gain coins with any value is to earn money by doing real work and then buy them.

comments.author: Joeyp
comments.body: Yes, there are such a programs, where you can make completely free BTC and altcoins too. But the are a lot of problems too with that type of programs. Need refferals etc. If you have your own active reff network, then it is possible.
